articles.author: Lameez Omarjee
articles.title: Govt open to power ships – but not longer than five years - Ramokgopa
articles.description: Government is open to power ships and any energy generation technology that can help address the energy crisis in the short term.
articles.content:
• Government has reaffirmed its willingness to accept power ships among the mix of emergency energy solutions.

articles.title: You’re Probably Underestimating AI Chatbots
articles.description: Just as the first iPhone reviews mostly missed the device’s huge potential, it’s folly to draw conclusions from today’s unrefined technology.
